text: Bomarea goniocaulon is a species of flowering plant in the family Alstroemeriaceae. It is native to Peru and to Ecuador, where it has been collected only three times in the Pichincha Province. It is known from mountain forest habitat.Mogollón, H. and N. Pitman. 2003. Bomarea goniocaulon. In: IUCN 2013. IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Version 2013.1.
